sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect , useState} from 'react'; import './css/met.css'; function Main() { const[worldInfo , setWorldInfo] = useState({}); const[countries , setCountries] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setWorldInfo(data); }); fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/countries') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setCountries(data); // const countries = data.map((country) => ({ // // name : country.country, // cases : country.cases, // deaths : country.deaths, // recovered : country.recovered, // active : country.active, // // })); }); },[]) return (

CoronaVirus Test

CoronaVirus is a dangerous threat to the elderly, children and families

Please do the CoronaVirus test to protect our world!

); } export default Main;
